unnormalised: The India vs. Pakistan cricket match is scheduled for 15/10/2024 at 2:30 PM IST. Please note that the schedule is subject to change, and confirmation will be provided latest by 10/10/2024.
normalised: The India versus Pakistan cricket match is scheduled for fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four at two thirty P M I-S-T. Please note that the schedule is subject to change, and confirmation will be provided latest by tenth October two thousand and twenty four.
